Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1986...
Released by New York (N) on 3/2/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1986 to a minor league deal...

Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...

Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/20/1992...
